entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is still on the train and has been frozen in place.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: A person who helps Harry escape from the train by pulling away his Invisibility Cloak and telling him to jump.

entities.name: the express
entities.description: The train that Harry is on, which is leaving the station.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: An object that allows Harry to become invisible, but flies off him when he needs it most.

relationships.description: Tonks helps Harry escape from the train by pulling away his Invisibility Cloak and telling him to jump.
Harry is helped by Tonks in escaping from the train.
